name: Gamer's Club Romance Game Demo
description:
I mainly made this so I could link this page on our Kickstarter, if you happened to have stumbled here without seeing it, make sure to check it out.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gcrg/gamers-club-romance-game


The main idea was to make a satire dating simulator where instead of pursuing gorgeous questionably-aged anime women, you are forced to choose between sweaty gamers. This idea evolved a little bit beyond that, and we have given each character more than just being a gamer. That said, THE GAME IS NOT FINISHED.  If you played the demo you may have noticed its in black and white. This wasn't a stylistic choice, I merely don't have enough pocket change to pay artists. I got the artwork we currently have from a friend who gave an enormous discount.
